ADDI $R2, $R0, 10
ADDI $R7, $R0, 48
ADDI $R9, $R0, 1
LW $R8, $R7, 0
loop: BEQZ $R2, done
NOP
SW $R9, $R8, 0
SLLI $R9, $R9, 1
SUBI $R2, $R2, 1
J loop
NOP
done: HLT

# 32'h80054338

---
